result.reason: Background thread in ProtocolBase.CloseBG() fires ClosedEvent and accesses UI controls without marshaling to UI thread, causing race conditions that drop all active RDP connections when one fails
result.approach: Marshal CloseBG() operations to UI thread via InvokeRequired/Invoke before firing ClosedEvent and accessing timer/UI controls, preventing cross-thread race conditions on shared connection state

attempts.raw_output:
The issue has already been fixed. Here's the triage JSON:
